name: WP Smart Cookie Allow
author: Wuptii

sections.description:
This plugin makes it easy to apply the new EU cookie law to your website.
When a visitor enter your site for the first time, it opens an popup that always stays in the top of the browser, even when scolling.
If a user does not accept, he/she will be redirected to the previously url, if none, you can chooce the redirection url.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload cookie-allow to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Customize the plugin to fit your needs
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
